Bio:

Darshan is a master’s student at AI, IIT Hyderabad and completed his thesis with Dr. Maunendra Desarkar. His research primarily revolves around the domain of table-to-text generation. Specifically, he worked on Entity Labeling in Table Captions: Leveraging Column Headers for Label Identification. Where he aims to identify the appropriate label for the entity mentioned in a table’s caption using column headers. Beyond my academic pursuits, he has a profound passion for hiking and traveling.

Research Interest:

  • Natural language Generation
  • Table-to-Text Generation
  • Question Answering
